column1: pêl (plural peli) is a Noldorin noun meaning "fenced field".
The word pêl or pel often appear as a suggested Neo-Elvish word
column4: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 20 July 2011)

column1: Noldorin pêl is a descendant form of Kornoldorin pele
column2: deriving from root PEL#Other versions. J.R.R. Tolkien also notes the word Wiktionary:tun#Old_English ("fenced field"; identified as Old English by Christopher Tolkien) in connection with pêl.
